 2017-11032017-08-17,  JUS,  , 
ActJudges Act
SubjectMarie Borkovich ** ANNUITY ** The Hon. Nick Borkovich **
PrecisGranting of an ANNUITY to MARIE BORKOVICH, survivor of the Hon. Nick Borkovich, a Judge of the Superior Court of Justice in and for the Province of Ontario, effective May 20, 2017.
AttachmentsAttachment
